text: palm sugar honeycomb cake or banana
has recently become a trendy absolute
snack among the vietnamese teens and
office workers with a dark brown crust
and slightly chewy texture this fragrant
cake pairs perfectly with tea
there is actually no honey in this
recipe but it's called honeycomb cake
because of the beautiful honeycomb
structure that will reveal when you cut
out a slice the recipe is pretty simple
but please follow the measurement
exactly and the instruction closely in
order to achieve that interior honeycomb
look let's begin
you will need 110 grams of tapioca
starch 8 gram rice flour 3 eggs 140
grams of palm sugar 160 ml of coconut
milk 4 gram baking soda 5 gram baking
powder 8 gram vegetable oil first in a
small saucepan dissolve the palm sugar
over medium low heat when it's melted
add 160 ml of coconut milk and stir well
when the sugar is completely dissolved
turn off the heat and leave to cool next
combine 110 grams of tapioca starch and
80 gram rice flour and sift into the
mixture stir well to combine
next crack 3 eggs in a bowl and beat
well
strain the egg and combine with the
butter
[Music]
add 8 gram vegetable oil and stir well
leave the batter to rest for about 15 to
20 minutes now preheat the oven at 170
degrees celsius for about 15 minutes
then place an empty bundt cake pan into
the oven for 10 minutes take out and
brush with vegetable oil to prevent
sticking then place the cake pan back
into the oven for another 5 minutes the
cake pan should be really hot when you
pour the butter into it this step is
very crucial for the success of the cake
so please do not skip it next add the
baking powder and baking soda into the
butter stir to dissolve and quickly pour
the butter into the pan through a
strainer make sure that the cake pan is
still very hot when you do this make the
cake for 20 minutes at 170 degrees
celsius then lower the heat to 160
degrees celsius and bake for another 25
to 30 minutes when it's done turn off
the oven keep the cake in the oven for
another 5 minutes with the oven door
slightly open so the cake will not
deflate because of temperature shock
after that remove the cake from the oven
and leave to cool when you cut out a
slice the beautiful honeycomb structure
will reveal perfect the cake has a
beautiful sweetness from palm sugar with
a rich and fragrant flavor of coconut
milk you can serve with some coconut
milk sauce and sprinkle with some
roasted sesame for more flavor i wish
you success with the recipe don't forget
to send me a photo if you give it a try
thank you for watching bye
[Music]
[Music]
you
